titles.title: Of inquiry directing the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to transmit certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to the Community Navigator Pilot Program.
Of inquiry directing the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to transmit certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to the Community Navigator Pilot Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: This resolution directs the Small Business Administration to transmit to the House of Representatives, not later than 14 days after the adoption of this resolution, any documents or communications that refer or relate to the Community Navigator Pilot Program.
